This example illustrates the conversion from spherical to cartesian multipoles for the collective T-matrix of a cluster, following Mun et al. (Describing Meta-Atoms Using the Exact Higher-Order Polarizability Tensors, ACS Photonics 2020, 7, 1153âˆ’1162).

```{r show_cluster, echo=FALSE, results='asis', message=FALSE}
 }

ge <- get_geometry('input_EE1')
cl <- cluster_geometry(ge)
terms::x3d_scene(cl, viewpoint=c(0,0,200), width = "200px", height = "150px", default_material='gold')
```
